description: This modern geometric bath accessory set features an embossed variable-size diamond shape design in 3D effect, each accessory is wrap with a high quality clear resin for a modern outlook feel on your bathroom.  The 6-piece bath accessory set includes Tumbler, toothbrush holder, soap dispenser, lotion dispenser, tissue cover and waste basket.
